EmailTemplate.description: An email to be distributed to new premium website clients.
EmailTemplate.name: Website Introduction- VIN Website
EmailTemplate.subject: Your VinSolutions Website for {!Project_Piece__c.Account__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Project_Piece__c.Implementation_Contact_Name__c},
Congratulations on your new VinSolutions website! I would like to take this opportunity to introduce myself as your Website Project Manager.
During this initial step, I would like to schedule a WebEx meeting with you to discuss some basic details to help us get started on your Vin Website. Before we get together, please see below for the information we have on file:
Domain: {!Project_Piece__c.Dealer_s_Web_Address__c}
OEM to be represented:
Inventory Type(s): [{!Project_Piece__c.OwnerFullName}, please choose a category. For example: New and Used, Pre-Owned, Commercial, Rentals, etc.]
Please let me know if any of the above is incorrect.
If you believe you have received this message in error, or if you would prefer that I communicate with someone else at your dealership, please let me know and I apologize for any inconvenience.
On behalf of the VinSolutions Website Team, thank you for choosing us as your website provider!
Sincerely,
{!Project_Piece__c.OwnerFullName}
Creative Project Manager
VinSolutions.com
{!Project_Piece__c.OwnerPhone}
